resources.string: Encounter is active! Let\'s fight this thing.
Encounter allows you to anonymously help health officials do pandemic tracking and cutting the chain of transmission.
Plot as described by https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=54XLXg4fYsc, updated always with the latest official numbers as reported by Johns Hopkins\' JHU CSSE.

Using Google\'s Nearby APIs, we enable anonymous detection of devices that also have this app installed using Bluetooth, WiFi and ultrasound audio - please keep Bluetooth ON for the best accuracy. Thanks for keeping the encounters number low every day!
Without Bluetooth enabled, nearby devices are not detected. Tap here to enable it.
Tap here to add Encounter to the list of ignored applications (whitelisted) on the battery manager. This will ensure we can keep the application running.
This UUID (Universal Unique ID) was randomly created when you first ran Encounter. Touch the UUID to copy it so that you can share it.
Are you sure you want to delete all your encounters\' data? This will also randomize your Encounters UUID.

When you press the share button, your data is converted to a JSON file, allowing you to share it. Following GDPR guidelines, you are in control over who has access to your data. The data is described here in more detail: https://encounter.awareframework.com/data
